quest_001.name: Ant Annihilation
quest_001.description: Ants are causing trouble in the farmland. Get rid of them!
quest_001.start_dialogue: Please help us with the ant problem.
quest_001.end_dialogue: Thank you for dealing with those pesky ants!

quest_002.name: Bounty of the Bandit
quest_002.description: A notorious bandit named Dusty Dagger Dan has been causing trouble in the wasteland, attacking caravans and stealing supplies. The Wasteland Headhunter has put a bounty on his head. Track him down and put an end to his reign of terror.
quest_002.start_dialogue: Dusty Dagger Dan has been a thorn in our side for too long. I've got a hefty sum waiting for the one who takes him out.
quest_002.end_dialogue: The wasteland is a little safer thanks to you. Here's your reward, bounty hunter.
